title: How hard is it to actually be in a lockdown for weeks? - Quora

response.answer_text: Staying at home for long periods can be difficult, frustrating and lonely for some people and may make you or other household members feel less. That can be particularly challenging if you do not have much space or access to the garden. It is important to remember that we have to take care of our mind as well as body, and get external support when needed. Stay in touch with family and friends over the phone or on social media.
